courses: [{"subtitle":"-","title":"Computer Organisation and Architecture"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Design and Analysis of Algorithms"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Discrete Mathematics"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"High Performance Parallel Programming"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Linear Algebra"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Mathematical Methods"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Object Oriented System Design"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Operations Research"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Partial Differential Equation"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Probability and Statistics"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Programming and Data Structures"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Real Analysis"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Soft Computing"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Switching and Finite Automata"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Systems Programming"}]
projects: [{"title":"CCD Reduction Package","start_date":"May 2020","end_date":"Present","description":"Developed a package for astronomical image reduction in Julia."},{"title":"Code-o-Soccer","start_date":"Jan 2019","description":"Programmed robots to play three vs three soccer match in simulation according to the assigned set of rules using predefined libraries and custom-built modules in Visual Studio.Gold Medalist in post-event competition held in Kshitij - Techno-Management Fest, IIT Kharagpur"},{"title":"Graph Visualising Software","start_date":"Aug 2019","end_date":"Nov 2019","description":"Developed a GUI based application to draw graphs and visualize graph algorithms using PyQt framework.Several prominent algorithms such as maximum matching, graph search, shortest paths as well as visualization for NP algorithms in graphs are currently being integrated with the tool."},{},{},{},{"title":"Intelligent Bus Service","start_date":"Jan 2019","end_date":"Apr 2019","description":"Developed an intelligent bus service system using facial recognition and geolocation tagging to provide efficient bus services for residents of the campus.Training data was collected manually and transfer learning was applied on a model pre-trained on COCO data set, the system provided real-time information about the bus and its passengers, including the total number of passengers and availability of seats."}]
